color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette for the inner Spinner (unless using the default slot)
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

size.description: Size in CSS units, including unit name, or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl), for the inner Spinner (unless using the default slot)
size.description_zh: 内部微调器的 CSS 单位大小，包括单元名称或标准大小名称 （xs|sm|md|lg|xl）（除非使用默认插槽）

label.description: Add a label; Gets overriden when using the default slot
label.description_zh: 添加标签;使用默认插槽时被覆盖

label-class.description: Add CSS class(es) to the label; Works along the 'label' prop only
label-class.description_zh: 将 CSS 类添加到标签中;仅沿“标签”道具工作

label-style.description: Apply custom style to the label; Works along the 'label' prop only
label-style.description_zh: 将自定义样式应用于标签;仅沿“标签”道具工作
